segments.text: I need to get some business cards printed up .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know how many you need ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I can get by with 2,000 .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can get started as soon as you fill out this form .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I hope you can make the new cards just like my old cards .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You won't be able to tell the difference with a magnifying glass .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: ... Okay , I'm through . Here's the form and my old card .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Very good . You can pick up your order in one week .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Now that I think of it , three days is better than seven .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We can do that , but you'll have to pay a little extra .
segments.speaker: S2
